name: JumpSpeed
description:
JumpSpeed is an FPS Racing game with movement reminiscent of Mirror's Edge or Quake and time trial à la TrackMania. Your goal is to beat each track as fast as you can, possibly earning all the golden medals and beating the developer's score. 

  

 Please play the download version if you have any issues with the Web build :)

 

Controls:

WASD to move

LEFT-CLICK to shoot

SPACE to jump

R to restart

ESCAPE to toggle fullscreen (desktop version)

   

Track List / Medals:

0. Tutorial Track ( / )

1. Enlivened Boards (Gold: 9sec | Silver: 13sec)

2. Lavender Box (Gold: 8sec | Silver: 13sec)

3. Loop Through (Gold: 6sec | Silver: 9sec)

4. Recondite Jungle (Gold: 10sec | Silver: 20sec)

5. Venerable Blues (Gold: 10sec | Silver: 14sec)

6. Silicon Sky (Gold: 8sec | Silver: 13sec)

 

Hints:

- "Jumping consecutively increases your speed drastically. Each jump makes you go faster!"

- "Walking diagonally before jumping makes you go faster than just normal jumping"

- "Try to hit all targets! Each target hit subtracts one second from your time"

- "Press W to move forward. This will make you move faster"

-  "Walking over conveyors will increase your speed"

- "Press F to restart the current track"

- "Jump pads are a great way to increase your speed and height"

 

   

This is a solo developer project. The game was developed for the 10th ScoreSpace Jam in ~40 hours. All assets were created during the jam with the following exceptions:

- Font: Xolonium https://www.dafont.com/de/xolonium.font (OFL)

- Sound effects https://freesound.org/ (CC0)

- Textures https://cc0textures.com/ (CC0)

 

 

Note from 10/27 : Fixed a game-breaking bug in accordance with the jam's host
